ComicInfo.Summary: Maddie Green, presumed deceased after going missing eighteen years ago, returns one fateful October night, having aged only seven months! She's been roaming the Sky Wyld—a fey realm where time runs slower—looking for her kidnapped infant girl. Now back in our world, she asks Jae-Sun Rhee to help rescue their daughter and earn a second chance at fatherhood... if he can only confront his own culpability that led to their separation all those years ago.
